body_html:
@hawkinsp hi - i see that the XLA test failure is because there are tests in tensorflow/compiler/xla/service that i am not currently running (only tensorflow/compiler/xla and tensorflow/compiler/tests at the moment).

is there a test suite runner for the ones in .../xla/service ? I can't find one
